## ValidTimeString type

A valid time string in the format: number followed by time unit. Examples: "10m", "1h", "7d", "30s"

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ValidTimeString = `${number}${TimeUnit}`;
```
**References:** [TimeUnit](./auth.timeunit.md)
